snippet: The elements of makeup organization: home base, what you take with you and how you take it.
abstract: Several makeup experts offer their suggestions on the best makeup to carry on-the-go and their favorite ways to store cosmetics.
lead_paragraph: The elements of makeup organization: home base, what you take with you and how you take it.

headline.seo: Makeup Essentials, Portable and Neatly Packed
headline.main: My Lipstick? It’s in Here Somewhere
headline.print_headline: My Lipstick? It’s in Here Somewhere
